page.title: 04SURVEY
page.content: A group of children from Coit school went on the street to interview the local people.Most people lived in Ecclesfield,the ones living in chapeltown and Grenoside have further to go to Ecclesfield Town centre.A large majority of Ecclesfield residents have lived in Ecclesfield a few years .That probably is the reason why only 4 people lived in Grenoside,and 5 in Chapeltown.Lots of people have moved into the Chapeltown area for more jobs and other family reasons.The older residents use more of the local transport than the younger generation.Most people would like more chemists street cleaners and many more jobs.The residents of Ecclesfield use local recreational facilities including Concord,Chapeltown,Colley,and Ecclesfield parks.
